documentation.text:
This TopUp Keeper Helper.
 It is a utility contract to help create Backd TopUp Keepers.
 It exposes a view that allows the user to query a list of TopUp Positions that can be executed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct ITopUpKeeperHelper.TopupData memory[] memory)
function (struct ITopUpKeeperHelper.TopupData memory[] memory,uint256) pure returns (struct ITopUpKeeperHelper.TopupData memory[] memory)
function (address) view returns (struct ITopUpAction.RecordWithMeta memory[] memory)
function (address,struct ITopUpAction.RecordWithMeta memory) pure returns (struct ITopUpKeeperHelper.TopupData memory)
function (address) view external returns (struct ITopUpAction.RecordMeta memory[] memory)
function (uint256) pure returns (struct ITopUpAction.RecordWithMeta memory[] memory)
function (address,address,bytes32) view external returns (struct ITopUpAction.Record memory)
function (address,address,bytes32) view external returns (struct ITopUpAction.Record memory)
function (uint256) pure returns (struct ITopUpKeeperHelper.TopupData memory[] memory)

batchCanExecute((address,address,bytes32.notice: Check if the action can be executed for the positions of the given `keys`

returns._0: an array of boolean containing a result per input

canExecute((address,address,bytes32)).notice: Check if action can be executed.

params.key: Unique key of the account to check for the key contains information about the payer, the account and the protocol

returns._0: `true` if action can be executed, else `false.

getExecutableTopups(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets a list of topup positions that can be executed.

params.cursor: The cursor for pagination (should start at 0 for first call).
params.howMany: Maximum number of topups to return in this pagination request.

returns.nextCursor: The cursor to use for the next pagination request.
returns.topups: List of topup positions that can be executed.

listPositions(address).notice: Get a list of all positions the `payer` has registered.

natspec.notice: This TopUp Keeper Helper. It is a utility contract to help create Backd TopUp Keepers. It exposes a view that allows the user to query a list of TopUp Positions that can be executed.
